author: yperbasis
content: Which version of EIP-4788 is devnet-8 supposed to have: A) the currently published one eip-4788.md 3ca51a1, B) with PR 7431 (set nonce to nonzero), or C) with PR 7456 (no precompile) but with `BEACON_ROOTS_ADDRESS=0xB` ?

author: __flcl
content:
`C` I guess
There is a contract predeployed to 0xb you are free to call within system tx, or you can set storage directly. The result should be the same

author: marioevz
content:
I cannot seem to get anything out of `/eth/v2/debug/beacon/states/` using this image: ethpandaops/prysm:deneb-integration-00aaeb9
Lighthouse is responding with the state fine on the same local testnet. Is there a known issue in this endpoint?

author: marioevz
content: Everything responds with the same `{"message":"Not Found","code":404}`. I've tried `head`, `genesis`, state root, slot number

author: realbigsean
content: Lighthouse should support it latest of this image: `sigp/lighthouse:deneb` or our `deneb-free-blobs` branch
